titleStmt.title: Epistles, the first volume: conteining two decads. / By Ioseph Hall.
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.H. for S. Macham & E. Edgar.,

notesStmt.note: Printed by A. Hatfield. Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

With: Epistles, the second volume / by Ioseph Hall. London : Printed by A.H. for Eleazar Edgar & Samuel Macham ..., anno 1608 -- Epistles, the third and last volume / by Ioseph Hall. London : Printed for Samuell Macham ..., 1611.
